title: The GOP Dodges Decision to Impeach Trump | Nnamdi Asomugha
itunes:title: The GOP Dodges Decision to Impeach Trump | Nnamdi Asomugha
description:
Republicans resist Donald Trump's impeachment trial, Roy Wood Jr. examines an alternative to traditional policing in Oregon, and Nnamdi Asomugha discusses his film role in "Sylvie's Love."


Please visit dailyshow.com/FirstRespondersFirst to help provide medical and psychological treatment for first responders on the front lines of fighting COVID

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
